reviews.review:
Игру испортили читеры, но не смотря на то что она стала бесплатной, играя с праймом я стал замечать меньше читеров.
8 из 10
its a good game man!! highly suggest it

This game is fun but it doesn't feel rewarding at all. You can win 8 games in a row top of the scoreboard and never get ranked up but lose 2 matches while top of the scoreboard and get demoted. Just absolutely ridiculous and tiring to do. To really have much fun you just need to have a game full of friends so there isn't toxic ass randoms. Just not what it used to be but i'd still recommend it.
Muito bom! Se eu pudesse nunca mais jogaria essa merda!!
Норм игра но тимейты поподаются долбаебы
good game but too many cheaters

This game is the worst game i ever playd. Valve is so gay and shit they dont care about cheaters or anything. i have reported mor than 20 obvios cheaters and no one of them got band. if you play this game you should be shamed of your self. And now that it is free the problem got even wors. I hope somebody at Valve finaly wakes up  and notices the amount of shit that is happening in ther game. But they probebly will never do something about it. They are prboebly just going to kill the trading community even more instead of fixing ther anti cheat. I hope this game dies so nobody gives a fuck any more.
